channel.title: Terraform Notes on Portfolio d'Edwin
channel.description: Recent content in Terraform Notes on Portfolio d'Edwin

item.title: Import
item.description: Import Resource terraform import aws_instance.foo i-abcd1234 Import Module terraform import module.foo.aws_instance.bar i-abcd1234 Import into Resource configured with count terraform import 'aws_instance.baz[0]' i-abcd1234

item.title: Terraform Alias
